body.name: Heat Resistant Steam Gloves for Clothes, One Size, Easy to Use with Handheld Steam Irons, Easy to Carry for Travel
features: [Portable and Space-saving] Hang these lightweight ironing gloves when not in use, saving valuable storage space. Easy to carry in your luggage, making them ideal for daily use and travel.
[Convenient to Use] The ring in the glove helps secure it, while the flat bottom can be used as a small ironing board for smoother clothes ironing. Say goodbye to wrinkled sleeves!
[One Size Fits All] With a large surface area and convenient ironing head, these gloves are suitable for most people and fully protect your hands and wrists. Perfect for ironing collars and sleeves.
[Versatile Application] Suitable for all types of clothing and clothes, these steam ironing gloves can be used with fabric steamers, travel clothing steamers, and more.

[Heat Resistant Gloves] Made of thick sponge, these ironing gloves protect your hands from hot steam. The waterproof surface effectively prevents steam from entering, while the mesh pockets keep your hands ventilated and comfortable.
body.description: 1. 1. [Clothing Steam Ironing Gloves] Heat-resistant steam gloves are made of thick sponge, which can isolate heat and resist high temperature, so that your hands are protected from hot steam. The waterproof surface completely isolates moisture and completely prevents steam from entering the gloves. Mesh pockets on the back keep your hands ventilated and comfortable.2. 2. [One size] The size of this steam ironing glove is approximately: 9.5 x 5.5 x 1.2 inches (approximately 24 x 14 x 3.0 cm). This steamer glove is large in size, suitable for most people, and fully protects your hands and wrists. The large surface is convenient for ironing clothes. The ironing head is especially suitable for ironing collars and sleeves.3. 3. [Easy to use] There is a ring in the steam glove, which can help you better fix the glove. The flat bottom of the steamer glove can be used as a small ironing board to help you iron your clothes more smoothly. You can hold the steamer with one hand and hold the sleeve with the other. This inconvenience will make your clothes more tidy.4. 4. [Easy to carry and store] When you are not using this small ironing board, you can hang it without taking up space. This steam iron glove is small and light, easy to carry, and put it in your luggage when you travel. This ironing glove is suitable for daily and outdoor use.5. 5. [Wide application] Steam ironing gloves can be used for all steam irons, such as fabric steamers, steam irons, hand-held steam irons, travel clothing steam engines, vertical fabric steam engines, etc. Suitable for all types of clothing and clothes.Specification:Material: Polyester + Sponge + MeshColor: Gray, BlueSize: 24 x 14 x 3.0cmWeight: About 49gPackage List:1* Ironing glovesNote:Due to the different monitor and light effect,the actual color maybe a slight different from the picture color.Please allow 1-2cm differs due to manual
